author: Special Correspondent
text:
On the New Year eve, Lieutenant Governor A.K. Singh called upon all people to resolve to build a greener and cleaner Puducherry.

In his message Lt. Gen. Singh said, “The closing of year 2015 witnessed mother nature giving a wakeup call on the imperativeness of safeguarding and preserving our water bodies. World over the spectre of global warming and climate change loom large. Let us resolve to protect our environment and create environmental awareness to build a greener and cleaner Puducherry.”

Leaders greet

Welfare Minister P. Rajavelu, MP R. Radhakrishnan, AICC General Secretary and former Union Minister of State V. Narayanasamy, PCC president A. Namassivayam, were among those who greeted the people on the eve of New Year.
title: Lt. Governor calls for a clean, green New Year
